admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The Irrigation Engineering Project
            consists of the following components to be implemented over
            a four year period:  (a) small-scale irrigation (SSI); (b)
            large-scale irrigation (LSI); and (c) a national 10-year
            plan for irrigation development for SSI and LSI.  The
            project also involves (d) technical assistance to the
            Ministry of Hydraulics and Forestry (MHF) and to the
            National Agency for Construction and Operation of Hydraulic
            Infrastructures for Irrigation and Drainage (AGID); and (e)
            technical and scientific equipment such as vehicles,
            topographic equipment, micro-computers, etc., to enhance
            AGID capacity and efficiency.
